msContents.summary: Scripture by various authors known as New Testament [p]

objectDesc.p: Papyrus, 27x16, 86 extant leaf(s), 1 column(s), 26-32 line(s) per column, 22-36 characters per line, written in Greek.

handDesc.handNote: 175-224 Original scribe with professional hand (1710 verses).
175-224 a Diorthotes probably contemporaneous with original scribe (29 verses edited).
200-299 b Later scribe writing in cursive script, perhaps by an owner of the manuscript (5 verses edited).

history.provenance: Excavated at Atfîḥ, Miṣr in the ruins of a monastery.
[1-6,9,20,22-30,32-60,77-86] Purchased 19311935 by Chester Beatty at Al Qāhirah, Miṣr from antiquities dealer.
[1-6,9,20,22-30,32-60,77-86] Transferred 1950 to Chester Beatty Library at Dublin, Ireland.
[7-8,10-19,21,31,61-76] Purchased 19311933 by University of Michigan at Al Qāhirah, Miṣr.
[7-8,10-19,21,31,61-76] Transferred to University of Michigan, Harlan Hatcher Graduate Library at Ann Arbor, MI.
